entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -25.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 01:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

Temperature: -25.5°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -28.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in areas south of Fort McMurray. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
